column2:
Buy  back  agreement  between  the  Purchaser  and  the 
farmer or inter-se guarantee or the corporate guarantee 
for the group of farmers. 
Note  1:  Where 
Inter-se  guarantee 
is  not  possible, 
personal guarantees will apply
Note 2: Purchaser is an individual or an entity involved 
in the 4P arrangement and having buy back agreement 
with the farmer.

the 
company and the beneficiary/s or 
other collateral as decided by the
